title: appA unnai nambinEn
sahitya:
appA unnai nambinEn enai ANDaruL appA unnai nambinEn
sharaNam sharaNam ayyappA unai nambinEn


anupallavi

  tappEdu sheidAlum sAmI ennai mannittun dayavinuk-ALAkkit-tAngi
aruL malaiyappA unnai nambinEn shabari malaiyappA unai nambinEn


caraNam    nOi noDiyAlum manap-pei tarum tuyarAlum nuDangi nin karuNaiyil iDam perat-
tavikkinrEn tAi anbu kATTi inda sEyai rakSippAi sAmiyE sharaNam shabari malai vAzhum
